title: Lakers, Sixers, Bucs and Pack: Woof.
description:
A packed show with the guys, who get into the nitty gritty of the most disappointing teams in the NFL and NBA. Russ takes an ill advised jumper and the Lakers get shot down by Dame. The Sixers ALSO drop to 0-3 after a huge game from Embiid, but a loss to *checks notes* ... the Spurs? And do the Bucs stink? Tom Brady refused to retire for this? And is there enough ayahuasca in the world to what ails the Packers? All that, plus they're shutting the lights out on Lions News Network, Mahomes is still really good, and the Giants keep winning. It's Monday, pull up! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
